sub_title: Lead Global Sales & Growth Markets | Transforming PE backed enterprises to improve valuation
summary:
A professional career that spans across 4 continents viz. Europe, Asia, Australia and North America has repeatedly challenged me to become the custodian for growth and establish corporate new ventures.  During this period I have learnt how to start new markets, build businesses at scale and assemble world class teams while the Technology industry itself evolved from outsourcing to total enterprise transformation.

Selected highlights from those years of performing a variety of roles as:-

a) Chief Executive of APAC region delivered 10x revenue growth alongside an industry leading  Operating Income hailed by analysts and investors

b) Sales Management Director to deliver a historical high annual sales for the market unit

c) Global Client Partner to build the first platinum customer relationship from Europe that eventually went on to become the then largest global customer for the company

d) Managing Director for Nordics & Baltics to receive both Gazelle Award (for growth) and KPMG Client Satisfaction award within 4 years of establishing business

e) Ventures & Acquisition leader to close a record number of M&A deals; and 3 of them being world class ROIC incl. one in Japan

f) Lead a major worldwide transformation program for a multi-billion dollar PE backed enterprise and created a P&L, Sales and adjoining career tracks to deliver sustainable growth

g) Speaker, Writer and Opinion leader gaining eminence in World Economic Forum, Print / Broadcast media and Industry-Academia relationships

profile_positions.description:
Member of Cognizant's global Executive Leadership Team; and responsible for building the business across Australia, Japan, ASEAN, Greater China, India and Middle East. 

The key responsibilities:-

1. Governance
2. Strategy and execution
3. Sales, Delivery and P&L Management
4. Enable Business Operations and Corporate Functions

Achievements:-

1. Business grew c.10x during this time contributing nearly 7% of global revenue
2. Improved operating income manifold bringing business unit at par with other mature markets
3. Significant uptake in market share; and in most of the markets grew ahead of the TAM
4. Build and grow in-country and proximity delivery centers in the countries as a step towards deep localisation 
5. Influencing CxOs in their roadmap towards business transformation and digital roadmap; many customer value moments for Earnings Calls and other Summits came from ROW
6. Closed multiple M&A deals spread across Australia, Japan, Singapore, China, India with a solid track record of integration and best-in-class return on invested capital 
7. Numerous international awards and recognition from Analysts and Advisors
8. Invited speaker and Opinion Leader in industry bodies & Academia viz. World Economic Forum, SkyNews, Business Times, The Edge, Indian Institute of Management, NUS Singapore
